text:
@DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump @AmericaFirstPAC Every week, you and your dad's puppets come up with a new hashtag trashing Biden. 

Does your obsession with trashing Biden have anything to do with the 83,000 American coronavirus deaths under your dad's watch?
